name: df-mri
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cmri, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cmre)), crab(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s1), wn(wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(cmrc, cv(s0)), cdif(cv(s1), csn(cv(s2))))))))))
comment: In a Moore system, a set is _independent_ if no element of the set is in the closure of the set with the element removed (Section 0.6 in [Gratzer] p. 27; Definition 4.1.1 in [FaureFrolicher] p. 83.) ` mrInd ` is a class function which takes a Moore system to its set of independent sets. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
